attributes.action: Use Bisley for target shooting at the 2012 Olympics and return small bore pistols to approved shooting club members
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Specialised .22 target pistols are of no interest to criminals who can freely obtain guns of any type.The only people to suffer are strictly regulated F.A.C holders.With quite a modest injection of money Bisley could equal the world's best facilities.To create and then demolish a new set of ranges is ludicrous.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Use Bisley for target shooting at the 2012 Olympics and return small bore pistols to approved shooting club members."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page23058


Prime Minister's Office
